sentences.sContent: A woman was stabbed to death in a frenzied attack on her home tonight.
sentences.sCn: 今晚一名女子在家中遭遇疯狂袭击，被刺身亡。

sentences.sContent: frenzied efforts to find a solution
sentences.sCn: 寻求解决办法的疯狂努力

phrases.pCn: 通过新闻媒介无情攻击或利用某人

trans.tranOther: frenzied activity is fast and uncontrolled, usually because it is done by someone feeling very anxious or excited
